comment._content: What a magnificent fish - shame they just HAD to go kill it  :(

comment.author: 95407527@N02
comment._content: that IS a great white, stop guessing!

comment.author: 99992365@N06
comment._content: I saw this shark and the boat that caught it. it was in the early 60's around 1963. it weighed around 2000 lbs. it wass female and when cut open had babies. the way it was caught , they used a inch rope with a 12" hook with 2 or 3 fish . it is then attached to a buoy and left alone. the boat then went fishing somewhere else and when they checked it , there was this great white. A crane had to haul it up!!

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/99992365@N06] Thanks for the comment. We'd love to see your photographs if you have any...
